title:
Komik
              A manga where the cutest girl in my school might like me
alternative_titles: Gakkō ichi kawaii joshi ga ore no koto suki kamo shirenai manga, 学校一可愛い女子が俺のこと好きかもしれない漫画, 학교에서 제일 귀여운 여자가 날 좋아할지도 모르는 만화
author: Kasama Sanshirou
synopsis:
Manga                    A manga where the cutest girl in my school might like me yang dibuat oleh komikus bernama
                    Kasama Sanshirou ini bercerita tentang
                    "The Cutest Girl in School Might Like Me!" dengan artis yang berbeda

chapters.title: Komik A manga where the cutest girl in my school might like me Chapter 00
